reviewText:
Every child we have ever put in front of this series loves it. We found the series on Netflix, but ended up buying the DVD to play during travel. That turned into putting it on at relatives houses, and their kids loved it too.

WARNING: The songs are very catchy. Adults WILL be singing them all the time too. After the mental breakdown from repeated exposure, it really isn't that bad. Do yourself a favor and just give in. Resistance is futile.
My grandson loves each and every song,however, his favorites are "Marcha Soldado".\, "Mariana" and "Pollito Amarillito". He dances to the music and asks us to play it over and over. A great purchase.
Arrived fast, My grandson loves it, I am ordering a second DVD
fast shipping, awesome product. Loved the lottie dottie chicken wrapping paper that it came in.
